_source.text: A cross section of a shell reveals three discrete layers; the periostracum, the prismatic layer and the nacreous layer, which lines the internal surface of the shell and is better known as mother-of-pearl (Jacob et al ., 2008).

text: the nacreous layer, which lines the internal surface of the shell and **is** **better** **known** as mother-of-**pearl** (**Jacob** et al ., 2008).
